publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3670 Bob Doris: Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow Credit Union, which loaned more than £5 million in mortgages last year and supported another 70 new homeowners; believes that the value of credit unions to communities is vital, particularly during the current economic climate with banks becoming increasingly unwilling to lend; notes that the credit union has loaned more than £13 million over the last three years and is preparing to offer more loans for first-time buyers in 2009, and also notes that Glasgow Credit Union helps citizens to save money and offers a range of savings accounts and mortgages.

S3M-3670 Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union (lodged on 10 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*, Ken Macintosh*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Patrick Harvie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Robert Brown*, Alasdair Allan*, Anne McLaughlin*, Charlie Gordon*, Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3670 Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union (lodged on 10 March 2009) Aileen Campbell*

S3M-3670 Bob Doris: Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow Credit Union, which loaned more than £5 million in mortgages last year and supported another 70 new homeowners; believes that the value of credit unions to communities is vital, particularly during the current economic climate with banks becoming increasingly unwilling to lend; notes that the credit union has loaned more than £13 million over the last three years and is preparing to offer more loans for first-time buyers in 2009, and also notes that Glasgow Credit Union helps citizens to save money and offers a range of savings accounts and mortgages. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Sandra White, Ken Macintosh, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Patrick Harvie, Hugh O’Donnell, Robert Brown, Alasdair Allan, Anne McLaughlin, Charlie Gordon, Stewart Maxwell, Mr Frank McAveety, Stuart McMillan, Aileen Campbell, Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3670 Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union (lodged on 10 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-3670 Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union (lodged on 10 March 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-3670 Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union (lodged on 10 March 2009) Johann Lamont*
S3M-3670 Congratulations to Glasgow Credit Union (lodged on 10 March 2009) Des McNulty*
